channel.title: A new group on my rsps?
channel.description: OK hey you know how theres mods and admins well i want a loyal player group iswell how do i do it?

item.title: A new group on my rsps?
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

You have your methods to load the sprite for character rights 1 = mod etc and 2 = admin

well the rights got upto 9 correctly. Just for 4 or 5 what ever. Add a crown sprite, load it onto that and your done, the right is already there just depends what you want it to be.

Read full topic
item.source: A new group on my rsps?

item.title: A new group on my rsps?
item.dc:creator: @Anc13nts253 Anc13nts253
item.description:
@Anc13nts253 wrote:

Make a new rank.
& it depends on your server.
Or you can just do it by player rights.
